PropertyList.title: XSR-71A Spacebird

key.name: Ctrl-A
key.desc: Toggle Unlock/Lock Autopilot on the current Altitude

key.name: Ctrl-b
key.desc: Prepare braking chute deployement, open the doors

key.name: j
key.desc: Reload Braking Chute, and close the doors

PropertyList.text:
NOTE: Throttle 51% + Engages the afterburner First Contact with Spacebird Now you are sitting in the Pilot cockpit On the Forward Cockpit if Blackbird SR71-A With view "7" you can see the RSO cockpit (not yet with equipemnts) On the Rear Cockpit if Blackbird SR71-B training With view "7" you can see the Pilot Student cockpit The Electric Master is OFF The Engines is "cut off" ON The canopy are "open" The Parking Brake is ON
====Start Routine========== Electric Master Switch On => key "}" Get the external Starter ressources with "s" key Engines will start up! the engines are started around 10% RPM Don't forget to close the canopy key => "d" the engines start at 10% rpm Parking brake Off then push the throttle to 50% for take off The afterburner is very powerful, do not use full power on the ground
Run on ground until 180 kts take off before 210 kts (above you will damage the tyres) Try to get off the ground before 210kts Retrect the gear. Fly!
====Space flight / Orbit================= First climb to around 44,000ft At this altitude the planes drag will sharply reduce to allow for orbital velocity! Enjoy. Continue to accelerate and climb higher! As you start to approach the Carmen line (100,000ft) the airflow around the aircraft will reduce control surface effectiveness be careful with the aircrafts controls! Enable Earth View Orbital Rendering in the view menu for the best result The reaction wheels will automatically enable. which will allow you to manuver the craft while in 0 gravity Continue to increase speed Watch your Apoapsis (AP) on the HUD, Or MFD. and Aim for around 500,000ft Once you've hit the Apoapsis at that height shut down the engines (Optional, Or set throttle to idle!) And cruise powerless to your apoapsis altitude Once your at your apoapsis altitude and vertical speed is near 0, restart the engines (if you disabled them) then Push full Afterburner, going prograde (flying straight) to increase your speed to around mach 26 Watch your Periapsis (PE) on the HUD, Or MFD and aim it around 400,000ft+ If your AP goes too high (above 500,000ft) Try pitching down and burning to reduce the APs alt and increase the PE even more. When your PE and AP altitudes are above 400,000ft then congrats! You are orbiting around the earth! TURN OFF YOUR ENGINES While in orbital cruise. THIS IS NESSORY Press } to turn off elec, then turn elec back on with } the engines will shut down.
Apoapsis is the highest point of the orbit Periapsis is the lowest point of the orbit While burning to increase periapsis. If your apoapsis grows. try pitching down at earth and burning. If you fail. Orbit all the way around to the Periapsis and burn retrograde (burn flying backwards) to decrease your apoapsis
Try to keep both above 400,000ft
GOOD ORBIT SPEEDS AND ALTS: Velocity ~ Mach 29 AP ~ 450kFT PE ~ 450kFT
====Changing orbit========= You can turn your heading by changing the inclanation of the orbit To do this. you must burn right or left from prograde This will slowly change the inclination of the orbit
====Refueling============ ONLY On gound refueling, if Airspeed less than 20 kts With Hotspot on Panel => transferswitch LMB => ON or MMB => OFF
ONLY Air refueling if Airspeed more than 200 kts and Agl more than 300 feet With Hotspot on Panel => transfer switch LMB => ON or MMB => OFF AND With "F" Key which open the Doors need refuel contact with Tanker (indicated by the green light "ON" on left top of the radar )
====Landing============== Final approach speed kias 185, landing speed 165 kias.
====Braking Chute========== the braking chute will be automaticlly deployed When the following conditions are all true
Brake Chute doors are openeded => key "Ctrl-b" Gear on Runway Throttle position less than 0.3
the braking chute will be released, untied When Airspeed less than 60 kts REMEMBER it can be used only once If you want it again you must reload it => key "j"
=====JAL======================== Rocket asisted landing can be deployed by pressing the trigger on your joystick (Military trigger) Use it to slow down quickly when landing on short runways!
====Radar================ That Radar is the last version ("Vivian" Radar ) you can choose the range by clicking on the switch =>mouse button 1 to decrease =>mouse button 0 to increase
====Tacan================ The Tacan instrument is situated or the left side of the cockpit That instrument is fully operationnal, look at the hotspot to enter the right values ====Autopilot============== The autopilot can be ON/OFF with Altitude and Heading with key => "Ctrl A" (toggle ON/OF) for the current Altitude
